body.p:
Maysville Ky May 28th ^1861^
Govner Magoffin
Dear Sir

We the youths of the city of Maysville have organised ourselves into a company for the protection of ourthe nNeutrality of our state and I the writer is the captain of said company and I do write you this letter asking you to please send me a sword and belt and our company will return their best thanks and myself in behalf,

Direct to
Capt. H. M. Pearce
Care of L. C. Pearce Maysville Ky
